comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Ruth Rabasa, daughter of Mexican diplomat Emilio Rabasa, part of the Mexican contingent at the Peace Conference. Señora del Campo was another member of the Mexican contingent. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emilio_Rabasa
